examinables.script:
gotoif colias_out was_here
gotoif colias_away was_here
pr There's someone there...
char colias
cp ...
pr Colias? What are you doing here?
music colias
cp Uh... Hide and seek.
set colias_out 1
open_talk "Yoo"
return

label was_here
pr Colias was here.

areas.name: Home
areas.script:
gotoif got_home end
pr And so morning starts.
pr Sure hope nothing's up with my room
set got_home 1
label end

gotoif !colias_out no_colias
gotoif colias_away no_colias

music colias
char colias
return

label no_colias
music protagonist

talks.Shoo:
pr Bro get out my house  shooo
pose colias unused
cp Damn ok
char none
set colias_away 1
talks.Yoo:
pose colias grin
cp Uh... This is a test scenario dude, don't think.
pr (Ok not thinking anymore)
pr All done
open_talk "Shoo"
pose colias normal
